sections.title: Overview
sections.body:
A modern, privacy-friendly static site for showcasing services.

This page is global and intentionally not tied to any individual profile.

items.title: Identity & Access Consulting
items.subtitle: SSO, OAuth/OIDC, Keycloak / IAM design
items.body:
Design secure login experiences, migrations, and enterprise SSO integrations.

Deliverables: architecture, PoC, rollout and rollback plan.

items.title: Backend Engineering
items.subtitle: Java / Kotlin, Microservices, AWS
items.body:
Build production-ready services with observability, staged rollouts, and least-privilege defaults.

Focus: reliability, low toil and maintainability.

items.title: Security Reviews
items.subtitle: OWASP, threat modeling, hardening
items.body:
Review auth flows, API security, rate limits, brute-force protections and secure headers.

Report includes findings, severity, and remediation steps.

items.title: Platform Enablement
items.subtitle: Kubernetes, CI/CD, automation
items.body:
Improve developer velocity with repeatable deployments and guardrails.

Includes templates, playbooks, and operational runbooks.

items.title: Persona Templates
items.subtitle: Profile templates for job, marriage, social work, docs
items.body:
Reusable static templates with JSON data.

Easy to add new people and profiles.

items.title: Document Vault (Placeholder)
items.subtitle: Organized downloads with categories
items.body:
A clean way to store and share placeholder documents.

For real documents, use secure hosting.

sections.title: How to work together
sections.body:
1) Share requirements
2) Receive a proposal + plan
3) Deliver in milestones with measurable outcomes
